description: Well-maintained rubber plantation with good soil quality and proper irrigation facilities. The trees are healthy and regularly maintained.

accessibility.description: Good road access available. Trucks can easily reach the plantation. Main road is 500m away.

previousYield.notes: Excellent yield with improved tapping techniques

additionalInfo: This plantation has been in the family for over 20 years. We use sustainable farming practices and have a dedicated team for maintenance. The plantation is located in a prime area with excellent connectivity and infrastructure.
